page.title: 16Schoolboy Slang 1985
page.content: {Insults:}bender,bumrash,crawler,creep, dick, jerk, mug, nerd, nutter,pillock, git, plonker, pouf, prat, prune, cube, square =conformist, wally, wet, wimp. {Praise:}brill, well, cool, cool one, =really excellent, fab, fresh, great, groovy,heavy one,magic, neat, not bad, right on, radical, raz, skill, wizard. {Money:}bread, cash, damage,dough,loot, quid, nicker =pounds, pocket, readies, swag,tin.{General:}cakehole,trap,mush, chops, gob =mouth; shut your face =be quiet; yer, yep =yes; take the mickey =make fun of; heck, drat =oh no! This is a doss =this is a laugh; loo, bog =toilet; muff =mistake; crap =rubbish, faeces; thick =stupid; hi, wotcher =hello; see you =goodbye; Bloke, guy, fella =man; {Also:}mega, super or hyper used as intensive prefixes, e.g. superwally, megadisaster.
